format.name: NCommasChecker
format.description: The argument value must contain exactly 7 commas. The commas may appear anywhere in the value.

fn_schema.name: modify_appointment
fn_schema.description: Modifies an existing appointment based on user instructions.

modification_instructions.description: User-provided details on how they wish to modify the current appointment, such as changes in date, time, or type. The argument value must contain exactly 7 commas, which may appear anywhere within the value.

appointment_id.description: Unique identifier of the appointment to be modified.

confirmation_required.description: Indicates if a user confirmation is required after the modifications are made.

user_queries: Hi, I need to change my upcoming doctor's appointment. I originally scheduled it for next Monday at 3 PM, but I can't make that time anymore because of a work conflict. My appointment ID is APPT-48291. Can you please reschedule it to Wednesday of the same week, preferably in the late morning, around 11 AM? Please let me know once the new time is confirmed, as I need to update my calendar. I require a confirmation after you've made the changes.

Hey, I want to adjust my haircut appointment. It's currently booked under appointment ID HC-3225 for this Friday at 2 PM. I would like to move it to the following Friday at the same time if there's availability, otherwise suggest another afternoon slot. Please send me a confirmation after you have made the change, because I need to coordinate with my ride.

Can you help me with modifying my existing therapy session? The appointment ID is THP-9913. I need to change the session type from in-person to a virtual meeting due to unexpected travel plans. Keep the same date and time if possible. Once you've handled it, please make sure to require a confirmation so I can be certain the changes have been applied.

I have an appointment with my accountant (appointment ID: ACCT-11234) scheduled for May 18th at 9:30 AM. I would like to switch the time to sometime after noon on the same day, as a morning meeting has come up. Please make this adjustment and ensure that I receive a confirmation so I know the new timing is set and I don't show up at the wrong time.
